// Grab input
var i = input.split(" ")
var target_language = i[0];
var target_language_lower = target_language;
var translation_string = "";

if (languages.some(c => c.code == target_language || c.name == target_language_lower)) {
	for (x = 1; x < i.length; x++) {
        translation_string += i[x] + " ";
	}

    print(fetchSync("http://linode.arin.ga:45678/" + encodeURIComponent("en") + "/" + encodeURIComponent(target_language) + "/" + encodeURIComponent(translation_string)));
} else{
    print("Unknown language \"" + target_language + "\"...use Google Translate.");
}

// Exit!
return;
